text: “Nɨ akar kaba Israelian gumazamizibar anɨngigh: Gumazitam kamagh nɨghnɨgh suam, an amuim ti akɨrim a gasaragha gumazir igharazim ko akui, egha Godɨn damazimɨn mɨze. Gumazir kam a fozir puvatɨ, guizbangɨra, o puvatɨ. Amuim ti modogha arazir kam gami. Guizbangɨra, tav an ganizir puvatɨgha, a gasir akamɨn tuaviba puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn pam navir kuram uan amuimɨn iti.
